analysis.description:
AKCCrowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol#843-885) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol)

Reentrancy in AKCCrowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleClosed (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol)
AKC.isContract (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol#580-591) is declared view but contains assembly code

AKC.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol#619-634) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol#630-632)

AKCCrowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol#843-885) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol)

AKCCrowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol)

Reentrancy in AKC.approve (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol#536-545):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol#543-544)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _approvals (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol#544-545)

	State variables written after the call(s):

	- _balances (/unique_chucks/17/0xb81f26d105bf46c0d956bebdd0cc89d34aa94053.sol#415-417)
